articles.title: Linda Evangelista goes make-up free after botched surgery left her 'disfigured recluse' - The Mirror
articles.description: Former supermodel Linda Evangelista has been papped in a rare sighting in New York after revealing her botched plastic surgery left her "brutally disfigured"
articles.content:
Linda Evangelista has been spotted make-up free in New York after describing her 'heartbreak' over her botched plastic surgery.
